title: Foreign Language and Culture Teaching Methodology through Dialogue and Interaction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language proficiency and general cultural awareness
context.additional_context: Environment enabling small-group activities and real-time interaction using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can perform culturally contextualized communication in daily conversational situations in foreign languages
Learners can understand the cultural background of target languages and select/employ appropriate linguistic expressions accordingly
Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans by utilizing interactive content provided on mobile platforms.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
